Definition.WordDefinition: LIAR, n. A lawyer with a roving commission.

Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)
The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Liar \Li"ar\ (l[imac]"[~e]r), n. [OE. liere. See {Lie} to falsify.] A person who knowingly utters falsehood; one who lies. [1913 Webster]
liar n : a person who has lied or who lies repeatedly [syn: {prevaricator}] [ant: {square shooter}]
